snippet: They played a program at the 92nd Street Y that featured Mr. Hough’s sonata for cello and left-hand-only piano.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews New York premiere of sonata composed and played by pianist Stephen Hough, with cellist Steven Isserlis, at 92nd Street Y.
lead_paragraph: They played a program at the 92nd Street Y that featured Mr. Hough’s sonata for cello and left-hand-only piano.

headline.main: Review: For Steven Isserlis and Stephen Hough, a New York Debut
headline.print_headline: Striking a Balance From the Left Side
